Title: An Act Establishing a National High School in the Municipality of Matuguinao, Province of Samar, to be Known as the Matuguinao National High School
Data:
BATAS PAMBANSA Blg. 116
An Act Establishing a National High School in the Municipality of Matuguinao, Province of Samar, to be Known as the Matuguinao National High School
Section 1. There shall be established in the Municipality of Matuguinao, Province of Samar, a national high school to be known as the Matuguinao National High School.1Ã¢wphi1
Section 2. Such amount as may be determined by the Minister of Education and Culture and the Minister of the Budget as being necessary for the implementation of this Act shall be charged to the appropriations of the Ministry of Education and Culture authorized under Batas Pambansa Blg. 40 for new national schools. Beginning in 1981, such sum as may be necessary for the operation and maintenance of the above authorized national school shall included in the annual General Appropriations Act.
Section 3. This Act shall take effect upon its approval.
Approved: January 21, 1981
